name: Kevin Hill
text: I had never eaten there, until the other day,and it was very good. I had a small pizza myself and it was more than enough for me and I'm a healthy eater,I actually carried half of mine home. Great service from our waitress and nice ambiance

name: Alyssa Tucker
text: We had great service tonight! Tovey(?) Was our server and she was ah-mazing! We loved our experience and will gladly be back üòÅ the artwork was awesome and the mixed drinks were just as good!

name: Rob McDonnell
text: I‚Äôve been to Mellow Mushroom‚Äôs all over the state of NC. I like the atmosphere and their style of Pizza. The experience can range from really great to average depending on the area. It was a Thursday in early July and I entered with my ‚Ä¶More

name: Mancil Gray
text: Never been to a mellow mushroom before, family was very happy. Service was excellent, food was very good, bathrooms very clean, and the prices are fair. Great beer menu!!!

name: Kristina Evans
text: Awesome pizza!  Great beer specials!  Loved the bruschetta app too!  Great meal .

name: Jeff P.
text: Always love mellow.  Server was great too.  Very entertaining.

name: Mrs Franklin
text: What a cool place!! The atmosphere is mellow and the food is really good! We had the meatballs and a cheese pizza, the sauce was excellent! I don't like pizza sauce very much but theirs has a great flavor! Indoor and outdoor seating! Will definitely visit again!

name: William Newnum
text: I love other mellow mushroom locations but the service here left me flabbergasted.

name: Avery Johnson
text: First time I've been there in many years they have improved greatly The pizza was awesome was a little slow but overall it was great

name: Britany Lasarsky
text: I always love MM, a little disappointed their mushroom pizza didn't list the mayo spiral in the ingredients. It was gross because I don't like mayo. Yea it's in the photo, but I didn't really think of it when reading the description. No mayo on pizza bleh

name: Emily Adams
text: Great service on the pet friendly patio.  We loved our Moscow Mules and split a pizza with half Holy Shiitake and half Pacific Rim.  So perfect and bursting with flavor and I've yet to find a crust that I like better than Mellow.  Their magic mushroom soup is also a must try.  Yum!

name: Rich Valkos
text: Good food, but toppings not as generous as other locations.

name: Rebekah Douglas
text: Ive been coming here for years. The food is always great and beer menu ever changing. Thanks for being a community staple!

name: Randi Rombs
text: This Mellow Mushroom wasn't quite as yummy as my the two I usually visit, but it was still pretty good! I was very happy with my ridiculously thin pizza overall, but could have had a little more meat on it. They were slow, and I ended up having to take a phone call, but my server was nice and attentive!

name: Nicholas Jordan
text: Excellent food, and our waiter was wonderful!

name: Scott Harris
text: The service was good, the pizza was good, the beverages we're good. But the price is high. A large pizza with three toppings was $26.00.

name: Alice Wesselman
text: service is fast and friendly, food is good when we eat in.  Recently, We had an error in our online order and they made us a new pizza - no problem and pronto.

name: Hailey Boyle
text: I am from NY, I do not expect to enjoy chain pizza, but I'm glad I decided to go with the flow. The pixza was really good and the salad was excellent. I really liked the whole experience. Nice big booths, kid and adult friendly, great service. Felt like I was a regular and a family pizzeria. Great way to run a business.

name: Andrew Reichl
text: Great food and service

name: Mark Cline
text: Great pizza at a great price. Especially Monday night

name: Dynast man
text: For a chain this is really good pizza expensive but good. Anytime my friends want to go eat out and don't know where to go I always suggest here. I wish they had coupons though.

name: Joel Umanzor
text: Great spot for pizza! Food was delicious and service was on point. Highly recommend it!

name: Joe Agnew
text: Great service and great food

name: Nearldean Pierce
text: It was good. Employee serves your buffet on your plate. No one touches the food anymore. Great idea. Cleaner!!

name: Bruce Kennedy
text: The original reason I love to go to mellow mushroom was because they make a killer Bruschetta for an appetizer. Depending on which mellow mushroom your are at, you may or may not experience a good Pizza. In this case the Pizza was a work of ‚Ä¶More

name: Alyx Bauer
text: The food is always amazing here. the staff is very kind and always greets you right away! My favorite food here is the pizzas and the pretzel bites with the beer cheese. Would definitely recommend this restaurant for everyone, including those who have kids!

name: Justice Rocha
text: I actually like their dishes and service, fantastic location next to my residence. The staff members are always friendly. Highly recommended.

name: Shahab Siahpoosh
text: I've always been a big fan of relaxed atmosphere and good pizzas at Mellow Mushroom. I've been to this location only twice and both times in a not very busy time, so their service was good and timely. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Dameron
text: Ordered a large pizza with 3 toppings and cost $28. Thats more than a Carowinds pizza. Smh. Would not give a star but its required for the post

name: Sheila Hale
text: Good service. Great sandwich

name: hope bishop
text: Great food, great service!!

name: James Bond
text: Hard bread, Burt, just terrible. People pay their hard earned money for this. You never have to worry about me again at this establishment. Just pure laziness!!!

name: Noah Walden
text: This place has a nice outside area, the customer service lately has been disappointing, the food is very good but sometimes its burnt or something you ordered is missing. Its a gamble.

name: Jeffrey D. Jones
text: Good pizza and great service

name: Maya Anderson
text: I love mellow mushroom and this location did not disappoint. Service and food both very good. A favorite spot of mine.

name: Bill Staley
text: Pet friendly and the pizza here is excellent.

name: Gail Fields
text: Got take out only, so 5 stars on the food. Had the hot hoagie club. No info on the sit-down service yet.

name: Gail Moore
text: Wonderful lunch buffet with salad bar and soup (not on buffet, just ask for selection). And ya don't have to worry about waiting for more pizza to come out; they keep the buffet stacked! Great choice of draft and container beers. They will ‚Ä¶More

name: Felicia Foil
text: This is great for a chain restaurant. The pizzas have lots of toppings and tastes fresh. Could use an extra minute in the oven. One kid has the cheese French bread pizza which needed more cheese. Other kid had the mac n cheese which was really good. Overall it was great and will be back.

name: JudahTheHammer
text:
Excellent choice of classic and specialty pizzas. Nice selection of sandwiches also.
Large variety of beers on tap.

name: Dorian Mclean
text: Best Pizza in town...

name: Matthew K
text: This was the first time I've visited a Mellow Mushroom. It was a very nice restaurant. The restaurant was packed during my visit, but the service was still pretty fast. all of the food on the menu looked good, I chose a calzone, It was one ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Painter
text: My first visit to a mellow mushroom and it's right up there with some of the better pizzas I've had!

name: Tim Gillow
text: The lunchtime buffet was well stocked with variety and taste!  Not to mention a nice price!  We'll be back!

name: Michelle Townsend
text: Just ordered from them via doordash... Amazing food! 1st time ever trying Mellow Mushroom and I'm sure I'll try them again in the near future as a dine in customer! My bf and I ordered the Bruschetta, Pretzel bites with the beer cheese and the Mighty Meat pizza! I typically don't give 5 stars on the 1st try anywhere but they deserve it!

name: Shane Marsh
text: The day time manager is awesome if it's not on the buffet just ask and he has it made for you

name: Brittany Hathaway
text: Buffalo chicken pizza is the best, taste just like a chicken wing, always fresh food and great service also trivia night is awesome.

name: Chris Bourne
text: Exceptional waitress, fantastic pizza and not crowded for a Friday evening.  I give it a thumbs up and recommend it.

name: Cynthia Jones
text: Great place to eat and friendly employees ‚ô•Ô∏èüëçüèæ. Try there spinach and Artichoke Dipüòãüòãüòãüòãüòãüòãüòã

name: Dean Buno
text: Good pizza and great staff

name: angela clark
text: Went to the restaurant in early afternoon and got great service. I wanted to take a salad home afterword a movie so I called in a salad on my way home and stopped to get it. When I got in the car something told me to check the salad before ‚Ä¶More

name: Caroline Durham
text: We love the Mellow and highly recommend. Tonight we split the Great White pizza, minus the red onions and plus 1/2 bacon 1/2 Italian sausage. Well...Joe brought it with the onions but immediately took it away to fix it. He couldn't  have ‚Ä¶More

name: Cassandra Wilkinson
text: Came here from out of town. My husband, toddler, and I stopped in for the all-you-can-eat lunch on a Monday. Everything I ate was really good. I had the mushroom soup, caesar salad, and a few different kinds of pizza. Got my son the ‚Ä¶More

name: Janice Metivier
text: It was awesome as always, our server, Sara, was great!!!!

name: Kyle Maready
text:
Food was mediocre. Way too much corn mill on the bottom of the pizza.

Also, there was gum stuck to the front of the booth seat which you couldn't see which got stuck to the back of my pants leg...

name: Jessica Woltz
text: Love this place, especially the customized pizzas üçï

name: Heidi Witten
text: Service was awesome,  the buffet was so good, and we'll definitely be back!

name: Jerry and Laura Hatzenbuhler
text: Fun place, great drinks excellent pizza. They have very unique combinations!

name: Richard Stoner
text: Best sit down pizza restaurant BAR NONE! LOVE the spinach and artichoke cheese dip with the garlic bread. When your " don't eat vegetables" kids eat it, its gotta be good.

name: Gary Remy
text: Our waiter Josh was very attentive, kept our drink glasses full. Food came out super fast and lots of it! Worth the trip!

name: DivaCounselor
text:
I love this place...the pizza is always fresh and delicious. The lunch buffet has great selections...well worth the price!!
I also love the hip and trendy atmosphere!! I highly recommend this place.

name: Nadia Valdes
text: The staff were friendly, service excellent and the food was delicious. It's a  nice casual place to hang out with great prices.

name: Eddie Rodriguez
text: Most amazing pizza hell one of the best pizza I've ever had

name: Robyn Tassone
text: Great food!

name: Angel Guerrero
text: Great service and awesome pizzas

name: Metilda Welker
text: Yummy salad & pepperoni cheese bread. Service was great.

name: Matthew Lariviere
text: Whats not to love? Guilty of carbs, I love the spinach salad and a good beer. Its a win win.

name: Areanna Gomez
text: Pizza was amazing! Super fresh, chill environment.

name: Nicole W
text: We came to mellow mushroom on a Monday to take advantage of the kids eat free promotion, where you get a free kids meal for every $10 you spend. Our waitress made a mistake and brought a pretzel appetizer instead of a kids meal. Next time ‚Ä¶More

name: John DeBruin
text: The food is good, but the wait staff if terrible unless they are super slow. It takes 7 or 8 minutes for anyone to come take a drink order and food takes a while to get to your table as well.

name: Joy Beeman
text: 2 hairs cooked into the crust of my pizza. Plus, the flavors aren't as strong as Papa John's or Pizza Hut. Found them to be more "bland" or "mellow". Not what I'm looking for in pizza, personally. Oh, and what's with all the cornmeal on the bottom of the crust?! Makes a big mess. Not a fan.

name: N H
text: Great atmosphere.  Friendly staff.  The place is rocking on the weekends.  Food was delicious.

name: Pam O'Sullivan
text: Awesome food and service!

name: Brian Schuster
text: The pizza was supposed to have extra cheese it didn't, the waiter asked if we wanted a cup of cheese to add to it when he came back 10 mins later. The pizza was cool at that point and cheese is supposed to be baked on. I hope they train ‚Ä¶More

name: Danny Dunlap
text: Awesome food, the best pizza ive ever eatin, great atmosphere..im from florida, and the pizza there is fair, nothing like mellow mushroom..thanks guys

name: Elaine Evans
text: Best Pizza

name: Gwen Payne
text: I love their pizza

name: MELANIE GONZALEZ
text: Came in tonight for dinner, broke down after a bad previous experience.  The hostess was friendly and quick to seat us, our waiter arrived immediately.  Joe was the best wait staff I have had there or anywhere in recent thought!  Glad we tried again, food was good and the service was excellent, thanks Joe.

name: Rod McDaniel
text: Mellow is one of our go to favorites for made to order pizza here in Burlington. They always do a really great job and we have always been 100% happy with the quality of product and level of service. Tonight was a unique experience....we ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Rich
text: Got a to go order, but my order was missing an item and I didn't realize till I got home.  My sandwich was pretty good, but I payed for food that I didn't get.

name: Grant Henricks
text: The customer service is regularly swift, fantastic vibes, welcoming employees. I will return again when I am here.

name: Bryan stone
text: We had an amzing time taking my son out to eat here for his 12th birthday. The food was great and the service was outstanding!!!

name: Steven Taylor
text: Awesome as usual, not very busy for Saturday at 6:30. Food was ready very quickly too. Awesome parking in the back, easy in and out.

name: Shawntesta Swann
text: Love the food and the atmosphere...fast and friendly service.

name: Jason Bauz√°
text: Great pizza. Not too greasy.

name: Mason Nicholson
text: Awesome pizza and the lunch buffet is a great deal!

name: Jacob McNeal
text: The pizza there was the B O M B!

name: LA DONNA WOODRUFF
text: Love their pizza. This location was very casual and friendly.

name: Kelly
text: Great food & even better beer menu.

name: Penny Herndon
text: Service was great but i dont know her name. Food was pretty tasty. Loved we could sit outdoors and you could bring your best friends rover and spot.

name: Nicholas Patrick
text: Still a 2, just thought I would add context since I revisited. Pizza is average, but the draft selection is really lacking. Go to any other mellow and they have tons of really awesome beer but this one seems to only carry stuff I can get ‚Ä¶More

name: Mikey Bates
text: Always good pizza and excellent beer variety

name: Mhaye White
text: I‚Äôm not into pizza but my husband and my kids are. I brought my husband here for the first time and he really loved the meat lover one. He‚Äôs picky at times but he did like what he got. My daughter love their wings and I do too.

name: james harris
text: Great place to eat will go again

name: Tim Newsom
text: Great pizza variety and lots of space either inside or out to dine. Great service. Good atmosphere.

name: Meg'n Williamson
text: Called in an order, got there in 25 minutes like I was told to. Pizza wasn't even started. We were told it would be free, then we were asked to pay. Pretty upsetting to say the least. Not to mention the pizza was warm instead of being hot and pretty mediocre. Will not be going back!!!

name: Jonathan Baskins
text: The pizza here are good..

name: M
text: Literally the best pizza and salads ever. They have bingo on Monday nights and it is a fun free thing we do with the kids.  Plus kids meals are $1.99 that night too. It's such a family friendly atmosphere even with the bar there.

name: Diana Perrault
text: Great selections on the buffet at a great price!!

name: Bobby Purple
text: Great pizza. Came back for more, fantastic.

name: Russell Teague
text: Great service, even for a large group.

name: Toney Harris
text: Was not impressed... My sandwich was made wrong and when I got the remake I know they didn't use fresh meat. They also put more onion on it than meat. My pretzel was ok but slightly burnt. I will give them a 2nd try cause I've so many good things. Maybe they can get it right.

name: Alexandria Lovet
text: The pizza and salad were excellent. I highly enjoyed the house special pizza. The sizes run big. I ordered a medium and should have got the small. Lunch and dinner for the next few days, lol. The Greek salad was great. Looked for a pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Jada Slayton
text: Great beer, great vibe and great pizza!

name: Dannielle Steele
text: Tried a new pizza - loved it, of course!!

name: chad alston
text: We really enjoy the variety of creative foods offered here üëç

name: Craig Hall
text: I really like their pizza. Also the pretzel bites with beer cheese is a wonderful appetizer. There is a full menu other than pizza but I've not eaten any thing else. The restaurant itself is clean and well maintained with friendly staff. I ding it one star because it is fairly high priced pizza but it's a nice treat for my family.

name: S. Glenn
text: Love the pretzels and 3 meat pizza

name: Trevor Lee Reynolds
text: Great pizza, great service, excellent atmosphere!

name: Tara Mitchell
text: Excellent food!  Great spacious space with booths and tables, outdoor seating, large bar, and small room for private parties. The staff is always friendly and attentive!

name: Trish Polk
text: nice seperate meeting room

name: Justin Brawley
text: Great pizza.

name: Charlene Dubuque
text: Great service and food.

name: Carol Cheek
text: Food for any appetite and very accommodating to my food allergy.

name: Phil Mickelson
text: We had the pizza bites with beer cheese and a small house special pizza. Everything was excellent. Very clean. Excellent service. Would certainly go again. ‚Ä¶More

name: CCAC USER
text: Good. Did the lunch buffet. Nicely stocked salad bar and about 6 different pizza pies to choose from. Good draft beer selection too.

name: Nate Humphries
text: Some of my favorite pizza - crust is great, and there's a tasty variety of sauce and toppings choices. Love the pretzels and recently got into the pretzel bites with beer cheese (so stinkin' good). The wait for food can be a bit long, but the food is worth it.

name: spencer holcomb
text: Had the lunch buffet for around $10, they had a buffalo chicken pizza, mighty meats, sun dried tomatoes/artichoke/mushroom/spinach pizza that was amazing, pepperoni and cheese, cheese, and a supreme type style pizza as well as a salad bar. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyler Courtney
text: Disappointing. Again. Service is good, pizza is mediocre and both the Sprite and Root Beer were essentially colored water. The tomato bisque and mushroom soups were very good. So long Mellow Mushroom.

name: Michael Behrns-Miller
text: Crusts are insanely chewy light and delicious.  Vegan options like cheese, tofu, tempeh.  Reliably great.

name: Staley Brown
text: It's a chain but it's really good pizza. They have a great beer menu and always have PBR.  If you want a custom pie that really beats Pizza Hut or Dominoes this is the place to be. Lots of unique creations to choose from and none dissapoint.

name: Timothy Petty
text: I was there during a Profit Share night so my service was pretty slow, but with all that was going on it was understandable and the staff was very apologetic and friendly.  Our waiter was friendly, helpful and had a great sense of humor. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chip Euliss
text: Food was okay. Could have been better

name: Amor Furniture
text: Waitress staff is the best. Food very good

name: Mini
text: Middle of the road on this one. I always forget about Mellow Mushroom when I'm deciding on food. It's great food, with mediocre service. I think that's what has always stood out to me here, was lack of friendliness in the service. I like the food enough to try again, though!

name: Thad Shearin
text: Went today for pizza buffet. Got there at 11. We were on a time crunch. At 11:15 still no pizza on buffet. When I asked to to just pay for salad and 2 drinks because we needed to leave. I was told by manager (at least I think he was a ‚Ä¶More

name: J. Ray
text: Visited here March 2017 with my son. Pizza was Amazing. We had our own personal pizza made phenomenal. Fresh ingredients! Cheese, Pepperoni, Beef the sauce and bread was definitely hand tossed and delicious. The restaurant was clean, the ‚Ä¶More

name: Rob L
text: Good food.... Good service..... Minor mistakes but fixed it very quick

name: Nicole Maldonado
text: The food and atmosphere was great!

name: Carlton Dalrymple
text: Great food,and service

name: luis Roman
text: Cant explains how good it was!

name: Ron Manning
text: Always fresh and very tasty--menu is different from the same old pizza places.

name: Amber Evans
text: Delicious food, great customer service!

name: Allyson Kelley
text: Great food and friendly staff

name: April Laughlin
text: Great for a buffet,  they kept the food coming out with awesome variety

name: Greg Miley
text: Our server Amanda was great. Will be back for sure.

name: Jake Turtle
text: Outstanding service and delicious food

name: Lee Powell
text: The food I have come to expect from mm is good and consistent.  Just enough variety to be interesting and not just a pizza place. Excellent choice for families.

name: Morgan Elaine
text: The service was awful. Waitress with the eyebrow ring served my food in a to-go cup lid? Also took 30 minutes to take my order.  The mellow mushroom in greensboro is much better.

name: Lisa Allen
text: Great pizza.  Wonderful crust.

name: Allison Wyrick
text: Best pizza around. Wide variety of pizzas and beer. Staff is always super friendly.

name: Bv5000 Greatest
text: Good pizza. Best in  Alamance County

name: ms. S
text: Love that you have so many varieties than your mainstream delivery companies.  They were very generous with the toppings. Met some friends for dinner and we all ended up taking home half of our personal pizzas. Dessert was delicious as well. Must try!

name: Garlic _
text: Love the crust, talked to a bunch of musicians while I got a little tipsy. Not bad. Good vibes

name: Bethanie Morse
text: Their pizza is absolutely delicious (and very filling!). The crust is thick and the tomato sauce is not acidic at all and has a wonderful, slightly sweet flavor. We regularly get take-out here and there pizza is always promptly cooked to ‚Ä¶More

name: Ronald Conner
text: Too expensive not the best food

name: Michael Goins
text: Delicious food, great service, wacky (fun) atmosphere.

name: Nakaja Croaker
text: They were actually good food was great and the setting was great I loved it

name: Pete Peters
text: Service was outstanding! Beer cold. Pizza not that great.

name: Jessika B
text: Service is always a bit lacking (based on numerous visits),  but food is good and consistent.

name: Lynn Wright
text: Love this place so much! The employees are all so nice and the food is amazing. Nothing but the best, and recommend it to everyone!

name: Jennifer McMillin
text: Love the pretzels, meatball appetizer, and pizza.

name: Hope Drake
text: Good food made with fresh ingredients.  Excellent service.

name: Elisabeth √òvrum
text: Nice place, super good pizza üçï order take out both times, and they were fast on my order.

name: Savithri Venu Gopal
text: Didn't like the food nor was the environment very family oriented. Well I guess it wasn't my kind of place. Pizza wasn't great!

name: Matt Hobbs
text: Great pizza and outdoor area which is dog friendly

name: Jerome Frost
text: Great service.  My kids love going here

name: Stanley Graves
text: Best in the City

name: Jennifer Hess
text: Great food, good service

name: Brian Delventhal
text: Best pizza hands down I have traveled the world with the military tried many different pizza places even Round Table Pizza an authentic Italian I love this pizza could eat it everyday they have a wonderful Buffet and their pizza dough is Heavenly

name: Christine Justice
text: The food is great and the service fast and friendly. If something is not right they make it right with a smile.

name: Christy Porter
text: Fresh yummy choices! Kid friendly and fun place to eat.

name: Connie G
text: I've been to many Mellow Mushrooms but will always say this one is my favorite! The atmosphere is always good.  The food is always fast and delicious. Any employee has always been super nice.  You can go when its slow or when its packed and ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Geise
text: Great service, and great food. Highly recommend.

name: Cameron Moore
text: Best pizza I've had in the area by far.

name: Rebecca Aguilar
text: If you are looking for the best pizza spot ever, THIS IS IT!

name: Crystal Lee
text:
Pizza choices outside of the ordinary plus each location has a small "local" menu only found there.
Family atmosphere. Great pizza.

name: Daniel Bramblett
text: My family loves Mellow Mushroom and I do too. But I'm old and set in my ways so I'm still mourning items no longer on the menu. But that's just me. Come on and find your own favorites!

name: Jill Glenn
text: We brought a huge group!  Our server, Kenneth was great!  He did a great job with the kids and got each family's ticket as quickly as possible.  It was a fun night.

name: Sam Paguaga
text: Best pizza in town... Great service with mellow atmosphere.

name: Markus Christel
text: Excellent lunch buffet with specialty pizzas like BBQ chicken.

name: Nick D
text: Great lunch buffet. Stop by for lunch Monday thru Friday, you will be happy you did.

name: Michelle Austin
text: People were great...food was slow, and soggy.

name: James Fritz
text: Best pizza in the area. Excellent and attentive wait staff. If you like mushrooms, order the Holy Shiitake. It's the best pizza I've ever had.

name: Sydney Turcotte
text: Amazing food and the gluten free is pretty good!  Always has warm and friendly staff.

name: Jason Scott
text: Had the buffet lunch with coworkers. Great salad and plenty of options. Able to accommodate large party

name: lonnie Graves
text: Great service and great food

name: Lisa Varner
text: Out of Coffee!?! Jerk chicken pita/hoagie Not on the menu anymore! I'm done.Very slow service. Probably won't go back. Sorry MM too many other great places.

name: ATLAS AI
text: Great pizza and food.

name: Daryl G
text: Wings were good. Pizza was ok. Good bartender .

name: Anita Gibson
text: First time visit and it exceeded expectations. The food is fantastic, atmosphere is great and the portions are huge! We will definitely be back.

name: michael connor
text: Food was great and a fun atmosphere!

name: Macray
text: Delicious pizza, just a bit pricy for the size but I suppose price and quality tend to go hand and hand. Service is decent‚Äî not great but not bad. Recommended for any meal; family, dates or even just by yourself at the bar.

name: Brandon Morse
text: Delicious pizza! We regularly order pizza for take-out and it's always ready on-time and cooked to perfection. The staff is very pleasant and helpful. Highly recommend stopping by and trying anything on their menu either in-house or take-out.

name: Daphne Brown
text: Went during the day for Buffett... didn't think it was worth the money.  Had to wait 15 minutes for fresh pizza on buffet.

name: courtney brown
text: This place is may favorite!!  Food is amazing and catered to about anything you could want from wings, burgers sandwiches pizzas etc.  I love the bartenders, Robby, Roxanne and Randi really are the best.  If you come in plenty they will ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Snowdon
text: Not the best experience, but not too bad either. Server was very nice, but kitchen let her down.

name: Phillip Sneed
text: Go every weekend love their Pizza great mixed drinks

name: Scott Tilley
text: Not Prepared for Lunch. Decided to try buffet at 12:30pm. First buffet visit, only cheese available. 2nd visit to buffet, empty. Customer spoke to young lady in bar, Roxanne, I think, no sense of urgency. I has to ask for a soda, no one ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Robinson
text: Good place to get pizza. Music is too loud though. Everything else is great.

name: Ezra Byrd
text: 5 words. Vegan, gluten free, mushroom pizza. Wow. These guys are awesome. I'm not vegan or allergic to gluten, I just like the taste of that pizza. Man is it good. Their desserts are crazy delicious. If they weren't so expensive I'd eat there more often.

name: Dawn Graves
text: I enjoyed myself the üçï had a different taste it was very good I had a very polite and gracious waiter!!!!!!!

name: Azzaraye Gomes
text: Food is always amazing, service is a hit or miss!

name: Craic Mods And Gaming
text: Great place. 4 starts instead of 5 bc it's becoming a pizza inn kinda place. But the food is always good, not exceptional, and staff of spot on.

name: Anna Curtis
text: Awesome selection of microbrews.

name: Bigdognardie A
text: The pizza I ordered was amazing

name: Wes Mays
text: Great lunch buffet

name: Josh Mannon
text: Just as great as I remember.

name: Lauren McCoy
text: Your basic pizza, good burger. Good wings.

name: Scott Glenn
text: Always have great service!  Just dont go to the one in Greenville NC

name: Scott Roesberry
text: Great location for the franchise.  Great pretzels and pizza.

name: John Maynard
text: I have had several pizzas & sandwiches. The food here is very good. We also enjoy the patio dining when the weather cooperates.

name: Jonathan Owens
text: Lunch buffet was nice. Good selection of pizza. Salad bar could be better but it was okay

name: Cynthia Thurston
text: Food was great, staff was better than the food.

name: Brittney Pendergrass
text: The best pizza I've had in my life

name: ky bear
text: Takes an hour to get two hoggies and an appetizer.  Even when not during their busy times.
